Air-Away: A smart air conditioner that learns your preferences and adjusts the temperature accordingly. It can also detect when you are away from home and adjust the temperature to save energy.
CoolWave: An air conditioner that uses advanced wave technology to cool the air more efficiently. It can also purify the air and reduce allergens.
AirMinder: A smart air conditioner that remembers your preferred temperature and automatically adjusts the temperature when you enter the room.
ClimateCube: An air conditioner that uses advanced climate control technology to maintain a consistent temperature throughout your home.
CooLinator: An air conditioner that generates electricity while cooling the air, reducing your energy consumption and carbon footprint.
